DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP !!!!! attributes.title: The worst app I have ever used!!
attributes.review: I opened this app expecting to have a pleasant experience but that is FAR from what I got. I have never been so shocked to see such a horrific layout. As a member of the IT Academy at my high school, I know what a good functional app looks like, and this just simply is not it. I am terribly disappointed with Trumps tech employees for putting this piece of crap together and actually expecting people to enjoy using it! Absolutely disgraceful!
